messages.subject: Dove Shirts
messages.msgSnippet: ... Michelle, I love those commercials too, and don t use Dove but here s a thought.  It sounds like the price they re asking, the added costs of the products
messages.messageBody:
>They have t-shirts that you can get that reflect these commercials. I love
>what they say. However, the only way that I can see that you can get one of
>these t-shirts is to buy their products. I don't use their products
>because most of them are too harsh for my skin.
>I wish they would just sell the t-shirts without hawking their products!

Michelle,

I love those commercials too, and don't use Dove but here's a thought. It
sounds like the price they're asking, the added costs of the products plus
S/H is about what you'd pay for a t-shirt. Why not buy the products and
donate them to a local woman's shelter or something. Then everyone wins.

Misty
